pageContext.geocode_address: Loudoun Park Lane, Sterling, VA 20164, USA
pageContext.public_note: To locate the Intro to STEM course please input '873247,' into the search function labeled 'Activity Number.'
pageContext.course_type_long_description: The Force Awakens in this introductory engineering course for young Jedi!  Explore engineering principles as we construct the Ewok Village on Endor, fly through space on our X-Wings, and defend the Echo Base on Hoth. Create motorized and architectural projects with imagination and engineering to defeat the Empire!
